title: NC man charged after toddler finds gun, shoots self in face
content:
RALEIGH, N.C. —
Raleigh police said a man faces multiple charges after a toddler shot itself in the face with a gun.
Spokesman Jim Sughrue said 35-year-old Jamick Dakota Corley was charged Friday with possession of a firearm by a convicted felon, among other charges.
Corley is being held at the Wake County jail. It's not clear if he has an attorney.
Sughrue said officers responding to a call Friday found the child with a gunshot wound to the face. He said the child was taken to a Raleigh hospital.
